entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
